Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
org.spaceinvaders.classes.Entity
org.spaceinvaders.entities.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicEnemy, BelowEnemy, PredictorEnemy, ZigzagEnemy
public abstract class Enemy extends Entity
Enemy class that represents an enemy Extends the Entity class

    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(Entity other)
      Handles the collision event with another entity If the other entity is a projectile, the enemy explodes, the player's score is incremented, and there is a chance to spawn a coin
      Specified by:
      onCollision in class Entity
      Parameters:
      other - The other entity

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
